snippet: The wreck of the warship Victory has been a topic of public debate in Britain because documents suggest it carried gold coins that today could be worth up to $1 billion.
abstract: Deal is struck to save the wreck of the warship Victory, legendary British warship that sank in 1744; wreck has been a topic of public debate in Great Britain because documents suggest it carried gold coins that today could be worth up to $1 billion; discoverers of wreck agree to document and recover the artifacts.
lead_paragraph: The wreck of the warship Victory has been a topic of public debate in Britain because documents suggest it carried gold coins that today could be worth up to $1 billion.

headline.seo: Deal to Salvage Britain’s Victory May Yield Richest Trove
headline.main: Deal May Yield World’s Richest Shipwreck Trove
headline.print_headline: Deal May Yield World’s Richest Shipwreck Trove
